changes: Enhancement: Standardized collision animations across all accelerator types for a consistent visual experience.
Feature: Added a configuration option to enable/disable random power-ups.
Bugfix: Fixed a regression where random power-ups were not spawning.
Enhancement: Changed the runner's leg color to green during acceleration for better visual feedback.
Bugfix: Fixed a visual regression where the screen flash would persist after a power-up collision.
Enhancement: Increased the burst animation speed and added orange leg coloring during acceleration for better visual feedback.
Enhancement: Replaced the ineffective speed burst with a visual 'lurch' animation for more distinct power-up feedback.
Enhancement: Increased the speed burst multiplier to 5.0x for a more extreme power-up collision effect.
Enhancement: Implemented a short speed burst on power-up collision for more dynamic feedback.
Enhancement: Tweaked turbo boost animation styling to use a transparent background, yellow text, and an orange glow with a grey text shadow.
Enhancement: Added a screen flash effect and an ASCII turbo boost animation to enhance gameplay immersion.
Enhancement: The high score system now saves and displays the game speed, providing a more complete record of player performance.
Bugfix: Corrected the high score saving logic to ensure that all completed runs are eligible for high score consideration, not just flawless victories.
Bugfix: Resolved a critical bug where the end-of-game results chart would crash on the first run by adding a defensive check to the chart drawing function.
Bugfix: Fixed a regression where the end-of-game results chart would fail to render by ensuring the chart drawing function is called at the correct time and with valid data.
Feature: Implemented the 'Flawless Heist' Chronicle high score system, adding a 'Hall of Fame' tab to display best runs for each difficulty.
Enhancement: Further improved active tab styling for better visual distinction and user experience.
Feature: Implemented localStorage persistence for the mute setting.
Enhancement: Improved the tabbed interface with pipe separators and a more distinct active state for better visual clarity.
Enhancement: Updated the default dataset in `milestones.json` to a comprehensive 7-year FIRE journey with 20 custom events for robust testing and demonstration.
Feature: Added a 'Disable Saved Settings' checkbox to give users control over `localStorage` persistence.
Feature: Implemented `localStorage` to persist user settings (emoji, obstacle, frequency, skill, speed) and custom milestone/event data.
Feature: Created `milestones.json` to store default milestone and event data.
Enhancement: The application now loads default data from `milestones.json` on startup.
Bugfix: Resolved an issue where a custom event's entrance animation would loop if the event was missed by the player.
Bugfix: Corrected the music pause functionality to use `Tone.Transport` for pausing and resuming audio.
Enhancement: Moved the version display from the footer to the main title.
